Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/Wellington
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett: due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Delayed near 18th
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are standing near 18th due to track condition. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are standing near 18th due to track condition. 

Shuttle buses have been requested between Pulaski and Ashland to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: 

#21 Cermak

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
